description: Serving gourmet melts & grilled cheese sandwiches in North Carolina's Triangle from our food truck aka 'The Big Cheese'. Bread, Cheese & Gusto!The Melt is an important piece of the American culinary fabric. It has been around for as long as the grilled cheese and expands on the idea of what a grilled cheese can be. The Patty Melt is one of the all time greatest sandwiches joining the Club, Pastrami on Rye, Muffuletta, the Philly Cheesesteak, Sloppy Joe, Reuben, the Cuban, a Po’ Boy…you get the idea. At American Meltdown we seek to honor the classic sandwich with melted cheese as well as add a few of our own delicious twists.American Meltdown will begin serving gourmet melt sandwiches in 2012. From the food truck, American Meltdown hopes to quench the cravings of anyone looking for delicious local fare in the Triangle. Keep an eye out for TLISH, too – a bottled Iced Tea from the creators of American Meltdown.
name: American Meltdown
